verses.text: Spirit Divine, attend our prayer, And make our hearts thy home; Descend with all thy gracious power; Come, Holy Spirit, come!
Come as the light; to us reveal Our emptiness and woe; And lead us in those paths of life Where all the righteous go.
Come as the fire, and purge our hearts, Like sacrificial flame; Let our whole soul an offering be, To our Redeemer's name.
Come as the wind, with rushing sound, With Pentecostal grace; And spread thy wings of power abroad, Wide as the human race.
Spirit Divine, attend our prayer, And make our hearts thy home; And with all thy gracious power Come, Holy Spirit, come!
